Title: Quality improvement project aimed at integrating an adapted mindfulness-based stress reduction programme into a paediatric psychology service
Abstract: © 2019 Author(s). Published by BMJ.In our paediatric service, referrals for young people with chronic health problems significantly increased in times of acute stress, for example, during exams, and offering support in a timely manner was often a challenge. In order to respond more efficiently to this increase, a group intervention was introduced.
